name: Monk
description: Disciplined martial artists who harness their inner ki energy to perform extraordinary physical feats and spiritual techniques.

resource_systems.name: Ki
resource_systems.description: Inner spiritual energy that powers martial techniques and supernatural abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: 1 per 6 seconds, +1 per successful melee attack combo finisher
mechanics: Ki points are spent to activate special abilities and techniques
Some abilities require maintaining a ki flow, consuming points over time
Meditation stance increases ki regeneration rate by 300% but prevents movement

resource_systems.name: Focus
resource_systems.description: Mental concentration that enhances precision and power of techniques
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds during combat, decays when out of combat
mechanics: Increases by 5 when landing attacks, 10 for critical hits
Decreases by 2 per second when not in combat
Higher Focus increases critical hit chance and damage of special techniques

class_mechanics.name: Martial Arts
class_mechanics.description: Specialized unarmed combat training that increases damage and attack speed
effects: Unarmed attacks deal 1d8 base damage (increases with level)
Attack speed with unarmed strikes is 20% faster than standard weapons
Critical hits with unarmed attacks have a 25% chance to stun the target for 1 second

class_mechanics.name: Flowing Strikes
class_mechanics.description: Chain attacks into powerful combinations with increasing effectiveness
effects: Each consecutive hit on the same target increases damage by 8%
After 3 consecutive hits, gain access to combo finishers
Combo counter resets after 3 seconds without landing an attack

class_mechanics.name: Spiritual Attunement
class_mechanics.description: Connection to spiritual energies that grants supernatural abilities
effects: Can sense invisible or hidden enemies within 20 meters
Immune to fear and charm effects while above 50% ki
Can enter meditation to rapidly restore ki and health

skill_trees.name: Way of the Open Hand
skill_trees.focus: Precise strikes and pressure point techniques
key_abilities: Palm Strike: Powerful forward strike that can push enemies back
Pressure Point Strike: Target vital points to temporarily disable enemy abilities
Stunning Fist: Concentrate ki into a powerful blow that can stun enemies

skill_trees.name: Way of the Iron Body
key_abilities: Iron Skin: Temporarily harden body to reduce incoming damage
Deflecting Palm: Redirect incoming projectiles back at attackers
Rooted Stance: Become immovable and immune to knockback effects

skill_trees.name: Way of the Spirit
key_abilities: Spirit Step: Short-range teleportation using ki energy
Ki Blast: Project ki energy as a damaging force
Healing Meditation: Channel ki to rapidly restore health

bonuses: Additional combo finisher option at level 5
Iron Body techniques are 15% more effective
Gain 10% damage reduction while above 50% ki

arch_classes.name: Master
arch_classes.description: Monks who have achieved perfect harmony between body and spirit, capable of extraordinary physical and spiritual feats.
skill_requirements: At least 5 points in any monk skill tree
Completion of the 'Path to Mastery' quest

starting_equipment: Training wraps for hands and feet
lore: Monks are disciplined warriors who train their bodies and minds to achieve extraordinary physical and spiritual capabilities. Through rigorous training and meditation, they learn to harness their inner ki energy, allowing them to perform feats that seem supernatural to the untrained eye. Monasteries throughout the world teach different philosophies and fighting styles, but all monks share a commitment to self-improvement and the pursuit of perfection. Whether they follow the path of the peaceful ascetic or the disciplined warrior, monks rely on their own bodies as weapons and their inner strength as a source of power.
